title: Lock in 10TB of cloud storage space forever for under $100.
content:
Macworld

Your online activity may vary. But whether you’re a periodic web denizen or a card-carrying power user, one thing is all but certain: you need more storage space now than you did just a few years ago.

File sizes are getting bigger, which means you need a quality storage answer for making sure all your precious pictures, videos, documents and other digital files are safe and secure for years to come. So, when an offer for incredibly low-cost cloud storage like a lifetime 10TBs of Degoo Premium cloud space for just $99.99 rolls around, it’s easy to decide to pull the trigger. This limited-time deal runs through October 31st, making it a great opportunity for early holiday shopping. 

While 10TBs may sound like a lot — capable of storing about 2.5 million images or nearly 5,000 hours of HD-quality video — just remember it’s also secured with 256-bit AES encryption for end-to-end security protection. Of course, while that security keeps everyone else at bay, it still makes it easy to share files easily with friends and colleagues while still maintain top-notch protection. Degoo is rated 4.3/5 stars on average by purchasers. 

It would usually set you back over $1,000 to lock in a 10TB Degoo Premium lifetime subscription, but right now, it’s available for only $99.99 if you make your purchase before this sale ends on October 31st.

 

Degoo Premium: Lifetime 10TB Backup Plan – $99.99

Save everything for $99.99

Prices subject to change.
